author: txtiger
content:
~~ When implementing an EIP in EEST and EELS, is there a way to run the modified EEST tests against the modified EESL repo? ~~

I have taken to overriding `eels_resolutions.json` with a local path and running `uv run fill tests/osaka --fork Osaka`. If this is incorrect, could someone tell me the correct way to do this? Especially since I need to run coverage tests as well...
